item.title: Little yell compiler error
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

			if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell")) {
			String rank = "";
			String Message = playerCommand.substring(4);
			if (c.isDonator == 1) {
				rank = "[Donator] ["+ c.playerName +"] : ";
			}
			if (c.playerRights == 1) {
				rank = "[Moderator] ["+ c.playerName +"] : ";
			}
			if (c.playerRights == 2) {
				rank = "[Admin] ["+ c.playerName +"] : ";
			}
			if (c.playerRights == 3) {
				rank = "[Owner] ["+ c.playerName +"] : ";
			}
			if (c.playerRights >= 1 && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("ZAch")) {
				rank = "[Coder] ["+ c.playerName +"] : ";
			}
			for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
				if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
					Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
					c2.sendMessage(rank+Message);
				}
			}
		}

item.title: Little yell compiler error
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

Sooooooo I was trying to make a custom yell for myself and I got this 1 error… .

This command is attached to yell

if (c.playerRights >= 1 && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("*Zach*")) { rank = "[*Coder*] ["+ c.playerName +"] : "; }

This is the error

src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:146: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Rank location: class server.model.players.packets.Commands Rank = "[*Coder*] ["+ c.playerName +"] : "; ^

Read full topic
